title: Atropos
description: Atropos is a finite mixture modeling (FMM) segmentation approach that allows for prior constraints including a prior label image, prior probability images, and/or an MRF prior to enforce spatial smoothing of the labels.

classified_image.title: Classified Image
classified_image.description: The output labeled image with assigned labels for each voxel in the masked region.

posterior_probability_images.title: Posterior Probability Images
posterior_probability_images.description: Output posterior probability images in specified format.
